name: #TeamSeas game
description:
Small game created as assignment for Fontys University of Applied Sciences.

I have created this game to try and get even more awareness for the #teamseas fundraiser. If you have found this game and haven't heard of them yet. 

Please check it out at https://teamseas.org/.

This is my first time creating any form of game so it's not perfect. The UI currently doesn't scale and looks weird if not ran fullscreen.

In this game you play as a diver which is trying to catch as much trash as possible.

Earn points by catching coffee cups, cans or jugs.  

  • Coffee 10 
  • Cans 15 points (Spawns less then coffee and falls faster)
  • Jugs 20 points (Rare spawn, falls fast)

Your diver gets heavier and harder to control based on the amount of trash you have captured.

You control the diver by using the arrow keys on your keyboard.
